mapper.select: SELECT /* MemberBaseMapper.selectAllMemberBase */ MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , PASSWORD , MEMBER_STATUS_CODE FROM MEMBER_BASE ORDER BY MEMBER_NO
SELECT /* MemberBaseMapper.selectMemberBaseByMemberNo */ MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , PASSWORD , MEMBER_STATUS_CODE FROM MEMBER_BASE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT /* MemberBaseMapper.selectMemberBaseByEmail */ MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , PASSWORD , MEMBER_STATUS_CODE FROM MEMBER_BASE WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
